titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the William N. Kelley papers

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Executive vice president and dean of the School of Medicine, University of Pennsylvania; earlier professor in the University of Michigan Medical School.
archdesc.scopecontent: Audio cassette tapes and transcript of interview (conducted by Joel D. Howell) relating to Kelley's years at the University of Michigan; also curriculum vitae.
